ComicInfo.Title: Double-Crossed; Crushed Ice; Food for Thought; More Blessed to Give...
ComicInfo.Summary: The story of a long-time husband and wife who, after many years of marriage, decide they have had enough of one another and individually decide to end it by killing the other. He planted a bomb in their anniversary cake, but she saw him do it, and thus disposed of the device in the cake. She, on the other hand, poisoned a bottle of wine and gave it to him......but he discovered her action and began to pour out the contents of the bottle. Both of them were killed by back-up plans of each other.
